aboutme1.p: or also known under the nickname "arminmiau". I am {age} years old and from Austria. Computertechnologies, software development and video games are my passion.

aboutme2.p2: in the field of informatics. At this school I'm learning programming in languages Java (as Command Line, Java Swing/FX and on Android) and C#, basics of web development with HTML, CSS, JS, a bit  PHP, networking, database engineering, systems planing and project managment.

aboutme3.p: Back when I joined the voluntary firefighters at an age of 10, it was only because of my old friends, however since when I became an active firefighter instead of a youth firefighter my reason to stay has been to be able to help people in need.
aboutme3.li3: Bronze achievement badge in radio/communication and tasks in the operational control

aboutme4.p: and I'm working on my own dream game from time to time.
